com.fluidops.iwb.api.solution
Interface SolutionHandler<T extends InstallationResult>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFailureHandlingHandler, AbstractPropertyMergerHandler, AbstractPropertyRegisteringHandler, AbstractSolutionHandler, CompositeSolutionHandler, ConfigPropHandler, CopyFolderStructureHandler, DBBootstrapHandler, GroovyConfigHandler, GroovyHandler, ImagesPropHandler, JarHandler, JettyHandler, NamespaceHandler, OntologyUpdateHandler, ProviderClassHandler, ProviderHandler, SingleFileCopyHandler, WidgetClassHandler, WidgetHandler, WikiBootstrapHandler, WikiBotPropHandler
public interface SolutionHandler<T extends InstallationResult>

A SolutionHandler is called when a new solution shall be installed. Each SolutionHandler is responsible for a single aspect of the solution.

Method Summary
 T install(SolutionInfo solutionInfo, java.io.File solutionDir)
          Install one aspect of the solution found in the directory solutionDir into the application The content of solutionDir is typically created by unzipping a solution-artifact into it.
 

Method Detail

install

T install(SolutionInfo solutionInfo,
          java.io.File solutionDir)
Install one aspect of the solution found in the directory solutionDir into the application The content of solutionDir is typically created by unzipping a solution-artifact into it.

Parameters:
solutionInfo - metadata on the whole solution to be installed
solutionDir - the directory of the "unzipped" solution.
Returns:
Information about the installation.
